title: The Chains of Fate
description: In this sequel to the 17th century historical The Moon in the Water, Thomasina ("Thomazine") Heron, believing her cousin Francis was dead, wound up married to Sir Dominic, now revealed to be an abusive husband. Abandoning her vile husband and child, Thomazine flees to the Scottish household where Francis and other supporters of the charismatic Royalist war-leader Montrose hide out. That is merely the beginning of the obstacles these star-crossed lovers must face.
author: Pamela Belle
